name: crowdedness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of a place that is full of activity or people: I didn't experience the crowdedness in the restaurant that others have mentioned, but there isn't much space between the tables. The guide rated each of the resorts on weather, accommodation, facilities, and crowdedness. Related word
crowded
More examplesFewer examplesThe picture she painted of life in the student accommodation was one of messiness, crowdedness, and a place where studying was almost impossible.The crowdedness at the location caused unrest, so the police requested the people to leave.
